content: **adorable and sweet baby bonnet** with this free pattern you can knit a easy cute and adorable baby bonnet ideal as a baby gift pattern contains clear instructions and knitting chart **sizes ** 0-3 months 6-12 months 1-2 years **gauge ** 22 stitches x 26 row = 10 x 10cm / 4 x4 inches **needles ** short circular needles or double pointed needles in sizes 3 5 mm **suggested yarn ** -double sunday scheepjes 50 gr = 108 meter 50 gr 50 gr 50 gr - malmédy - annell 50 gr = 125m 50 gr 50 gr 50 gr
